sentence.text: We describe five affected individuals with similar dysmorphic facies, and three of them had either complete situs inversus, dextrocardia, or transposition of the adenylate cyclase-activating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway arteries; similar cardiac abnormalities were previously identified in a mouse mutant for the orthologous limb morphogenesis.

entity.text: adenylate cyclase-activating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway
